sentences.sContent: The governor gave only a vague outline of his tax plan.
sentences.sCn: 州长只是含糊地大致说了一下他的税务计划。

sentences.sContent: ...vague figures of power like remote bosses at the mill or clerks at the bank...

synos.tran: 模糊的；含糊的；不明确的；暧昧的

remMethod.val: vag(漫游) ＋ ue → 思路四处游走 → 模糊的， 含糊的

trans.tranOther: unclear because someone does not give enough detailed information or does not say exactly what they mean
